metadata.title: CVE-2023-0699 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in GPU in Google Chrome prior to 110.0.5481.77 allowed aremote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTMLpage and browser shutdown. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
